hey friends. i found the soln to play side by side video into single view(that is in 2D). Just follow the steps..
1. Open or drag n drop the downloaded video file.
2. Go to FILE>LAYOUT > Sensio
3. Go to View > VIEWING MODE > MONOSCOPIC LEFT IMAGE ONLY OR RIGHT IMAGE ONLY.

thats it..
